name: .HPRJ
summary: Learn about .HPRJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: HPRJ files are not meant to be opened outside the ZOOM H6 recorder on which they were created. To use audio you recorded on a ZOOM H6 recorder on a different device, export the recording's WAV files from your recorder. You do not have to export the corresponding HPRJ file.
